Description: Use permit architectural control and BMR housing agreement to construct 88 100% affordable multifamily residential units in three 3-story buildings on a vacant substandard lot utilizing State density bonus laws.
Use permit to reduce interior side setback for an accessory dwelling unit (ADU) from 4 feet to 3 feet for new construction or conversion of small structures.
Use permit to demolish an existing single-story residence and detached structures and construct a new two-story single-family residence and detached garage on a substandard lot including an ADU.
Use permit for excavation within the required rear setback for a retaining wall for a single-family residential property.
Use permit for a second-story addition to an existing single-family residence on a substandard lot.
Use permit revision for an existing nonconforming two-story single-family residence on a substandard lot including a ground floor addition and a new second-level deck.

Use permit architectural control and BMR housing agreement to demolish an existing commercial building and construct an eight-story 112-unit multifamily residential building utilizing city and State density bonus laws (10 very low-income 4 moderate-income BMR units).
Use permit to demolish an existing two-unit multifamily residence and accessory building and construct a new two-story single-family residence and detached garage including an attached ADU.
Use permit to demolish an existing single-story single-family residence and detached garage and construct a new two-story single-family residence on a substandard lot	including an attached ADU.
Use permit for a new two-story residence on a substandard lot including an attached ADU with previous garage conversion permits.
Use permit revision for a second-story addition above an existing attached garage of a nonconforming single-story residence.
Use permit for the use and storage of hazardous materials associated with a new research and development biotech business in an M.2 general industrial zoning district.
Use permit to demolish an existing single-story single-family residence and construct a new two-story single-family residence with a basement on a substandard lot	including a detached ADU.
Variance to reconstruct a nonconforming wall at a reduced setback of 5 feet where 5.5 feet is required for an existing single-family residence on a substandard lot in a flood zone.
Development Agreement Annual Review to determine compliance for a mixed-use project with residential and commercial components including 20 BMR units.
Development Agreement Annual Review to determine compliance for a mixed-use project by Stanford University with residential units for affiliates and retail space including 8 BMR units.
Architectural control and use permit for exterior modifications and change of use from personal service (spa) to a Fitness studio in a shopping center with substandard parking.
Development Agreement Annual Review to determine compliance for a 60-acre mixed-use master plan project.
Development Agreement Annual Review to determine compliance for a 60-acre mixed-use master plan project.
Development Agreement Annual Review to determine compliance for a 60-acre mixed-use master plan project.
One Meta Way Development Agreement Annual Review to determine compliance for East Campus West Campus and Campus Expansion projects.

Use permit and variance to demolish an existing single-story residence and construct a new two-story single-family residence with a basement on a substandard corner lot including excavation for a light well and a garage entrance variance. Includes an attached ADU.
Use permit to construct 6-foot tall metal fences/gates within the front setback transitioning to 8-foot tall fences and to modify site-wide parking and circulation plans.
Use permit to construct 6-foot tall metal fences/gates within the front setback transitioning to 8-foot tall fences and to modify site-wide parking and circulation plans.
Use permit to construct 6-foot tall metal fences/gates within the front setback transitioning to 8-foot tall fences and to modify site-wide parking and circulation plans.
Use permit to convert an existing personal service use into a massage use in a commercial building on a substandard parking lot.
Use permit for a new fitness use in an existing multi-tenant commercial building on a property substandard with regard to minimum parking requirement.
Architectural control permit for minor alterations to existing office buildings including installation of metal roll-up gates for underground parking entrances and a side-facing pedestrian entrance.
Use permit item continued to August 11 2025
Use permit to construct first-floor additions and interior modifications to an existing nonconforming single-story residence including an attached ADU and Junior ADU (JADU).
Use permit to modify an ABC license from beer/wine to general eating place (allowing distilled spirits) and modify hours of operation to 8 AM - 7 PM 7 days a week for an existing restaurant.
Use permit for the sale of beer and wine for on-site consumption at existing corporate campus cafeterias.

Use permit to demolish an existing single-story single-family residence and construct a new two-story single-family residence on a substandard lot including an attached ADU and removal of a street tree.
Use permit to modify the Planned Development Permit (PDP) for an existing full-service grocery store (Draeger's Market).
